nodes.text: The Clan of the Toribota was a nomadic enclave native to the planet Isde Naha. After astronomical conjecture pointed the enclave to the desert moon of Jedha, they believed the star in the system to be the First Light, the first star glimpsed by their early ancestors. Omisha Joyo, a member of the Clan of the Toribota, was present in Jedha City shortly before it was destroyed by the Galactic Empire's Death Star.
